statements: SELECT * FROM historical_text_analysis;
SELECT text_data FROM historical_text_analysis WHERE id = 1;
SELECT analysis_result->'sentiment' FROM historical_text_analysis WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, text_data FROM historical_text_analysis WHERE id > 3;
SELECT * FROM historical_text_analysis WHERE analysis_result->'classification' = 'positive';
SELECT * FROM historical_text_analysis WHERE id = 3;
SELECT text_data, analysis_result FROM historical_text_analysis WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, text_data FROM historical_text_analysis WHERE text_data ILIKE '%important%' AND analysis_result->>'sentiment' = 'positive';
SELECT id, analysis_result FROM historical_text_analysis WHERE analysis_result->'keywords' @> '[
SELECT * FROM historical_text_data_pattern_analysis;
SELECT id, text_data, pattern_type FROM historical_text_data_pattern_analysis WHERE pattern_type = 'regex';
SELECT analysis_result->>'confidence_score' AS confidence_score FROM historical_text_data_pattern_analysis WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM language_generation_models ORDER BY model_name DESC;
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM language_generation_models WHERE generation_pattern LIKE '%custom%';
SELECT * FROM historical_text_data_pattern_analysis ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT text_data, pattern_type FROM historical_text_data_pattern_analysis WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY pattern_type ASC
SELECT id, text_data, pattern_type, analysis_result FROM historical_text_data_pattern_analysis WHERE pattern_type = 'regex' ORDER BY id LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM language_generation_models WHERE model_name LIKE '%text%' ORDER BY model_id DESC
SELECT model_id, model_name, generation_pattern FROM language_generation_models WHERE model_config->>'max_length' < '500' ORDER BY model_id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM language_patterns;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM language_patterns ORDER BY pattern_id DESC;
SELECT model_id, model_name, model_accuracy FROM language_models WHERE model_accuracy > 0.9;
SELECT text_id, text_content FROM historical_texts WHERE text_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT text_id, text_date FROM historical_texts ORDER BY text_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_texts WHERE text_id = 1
SELECT text_content, text_date FROM historical_texts ORDER BY text_date DESC
SELECT pattern_description FROM language_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 3
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM language_models WHERE model_accuracy > 0.8
SELECT * FROM historical_texts JOIN language_patterns ON historical_texts.text_id = language_patterns.pattern_id
SELECT * FROM text_data_pattern ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id,title,content,timestamp FROM text_data_pattern WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name,description,version FROM language_models WHERE version > 1.5;
SELECT * FROM word_frequency WHERE word = 'example';
SELECT model_id,evaluation_result,timestamp FROM model_evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_result DESC;
SELECT * FROM text_data_pattern ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, title, content FROM text_data_pattern WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT name, description FROM language_models WHERE version = 1.0 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT word, count FROM word_frequency WHERE count > 100 ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT model_id, evaluation_result FROM model_evaluations WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY evaluation_result DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_text_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT text_data, timestamp FROM historical_text_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT model_name, description FROM language_models WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT pattern, frequency FROM text_patterns WHERE frequency >= 100 ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT log_message, status, timestamp FROM analysis_logs WHERE status = 'error' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_text_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT model_name, description FROM language_models WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT pattern, pattern_type, SUM(frequency) AS total_frequency FROM text_patterns GROUP BY pattern, pattern_type HAVING total_frequency > 100;
SELECT text_output, timestamp FROM generated_text WHERE generated_by = 3 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, log_message, status FROM analysis_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND status = 'error';
